StreamPreflight_WifiFrequencyLowDescript: Your WiFi frequency is likely too low to handle streaming properly
StreamPreflight_HostPCLockedDescription: Your host PC is locked and streaming won't begin until it's unlocked
StreamPreflight_HostPCOnWireless: Your host PC is connected wirelessly to your router
StreamPreflight_HostPCOnWirelessDescript: Your host PC is connected wirelessly to your router which is not a supported method to use Steam Link.
StreamPreflight_WifiBandwidthLowDescript: Please improve your wifi connection for a better streaming experience.
StreamCheck_WifiNotConnectedDescription: Your device is not connected to WiFi
StreamSideBand_Description: There has been an error with the stream.
StreamSideBand_ConnectionStartedDescript: Your PC running Steam Link is connecting and the headset is waiting for data to be received.
StreamSideBand_BadConnectionStatusDescri: There's a problem with your connection to the PC running Steam Link. Check Internet settings and try again.
StreamSideBand_BadProtocolDescription: Your PC running Steam Link is sending data, but the headset is not able to parse it. Try restarting Steam Link.
StreamSideBand_WrongIdDescription: Your headset session does not match your host's SteamVR session. Please restart the app.
StreamSideBand_AlreadyActiveLocalDescrip: Another headset has activated on your host PC. Please disconnect and restart SteamVR.
StreamSideBand_AlreadyActiveDescription: Another headset is connected to your host PC. Waiting for it to disconnect.
StreamSideBand_UnknownIssueDescription: An unknown error occurred with Steam Link. Try restarting Steam Link.
StreamLoading_WaitingForHostTooLong: Connecting to host PC is taking longer than usual...
StreamError_ConnectionToHostLost: The connection to your host running Steam was lost.
StreamError_ConnectionToHostLostReconnec: The connection to your host running Steam was lost. Attempting to reconnect...
StreamError_HostNotRespondingDescription: Your host PC has stopped responding. Please restart SteamVR.
StreamError_ConnectionToHostLostCheckErr: The connection to your host device running Steam was lost. Check the errors below.
StreamError_ConnectedNoVideoDescription: Your headset is connected to a host PC, but no video is being streamed. Check the host PC for errors.
StreamError_ConnectedNoDecodeDescription: Your headset is receiving video, but is unable to present it.
StreamPreflight_Description: We have detected the following issues with your VR streaming setup.
Abort_KeyChangedMessage: SteamVR has been restarted on your PC. Please reconnect.
Abort_HostQuitDescription: SteamVR has exited on your PC. Restart Steam Link to reconnect.
StreamPreflight_IgnoreForNetwork: Don't warn me about this on this network again
